question: Who launched Umang - unified mobile app for new age app?
explanation: Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) laid down provisions to help Pensioners in submitting Jeevan Pramaan with ease. Those pensioners who have already submitted Jeevan Pramaan digitally for the previous year need not essentially submit digital Pramaan for the current year. Those who have not submitted Jeevan Pramaan digitally even once should submit it digitally in this month. This facility is available in all offices of the EPFO, pension disbursing banks, and common service centers.
